description: Valid Vehicle Gateway (VG) harsh acceleration events logged by a VG in a customer org over 5 mph.

schema.name: org_id
schema.description: The Internal ID for the customer's Samsara Org

schema.name: date
schema.description: The date on which the event occurred in 'YYYY-mm-dd' format

schema.name: time
schema.description: The UNIX epoch time (milliseconds) on which the event occurred

schema.name: speed_mph
schema.description: The last GPS speed recording in miles per hour in the event period

schema.name: max_accel_gs
schema.description: The maximum gravitational force (Gs) reached during the period of the event

schema.name: event_duration_ms
schema.description: The duration of the event in milliseconds
